thread.title: California Vacation Time Budget Calculator

title: California Vacation Time Budget Calculator
text: How many days will you be traveling in California? Do not include travel time to get here or get home. Your Plans Enter the time you want to spend in each place in days or parts of days (0.25 equals one-fourth of a day or two hours) days 1 long day (9 to 10 hours with few stops) 2 days is better See more about Hearst Castle and Monterey below days Coast Highway San Francisco to Oregon Border 1 very long day, but 2 is better days Death Valley : 1 day and night days Disneyland Park: 1.5 to 2 days California Adventure 0.5 to 1 day days
